text:
[Verse]
Lights twinkling up so high
Night falls and dreams do fly
Eyes wide and hearts alive
Shining tails leave the sky

[Verse 2]
Moon whispers lilting sighs
Soft glow on earth it lies
Footsteps in stardust paint
Worlds in our heads they ain’t

[Chorus]
Stars above oh stars above
Spread your magic touch of love
Hearts aglow and minds in trance
In your light we start to dance

[Verse 3]
Midnight makes us believe
Wishes that we can retrieve
Shooting star please come through
Make our dreams all brand new

[Chorus]
Stars above oh stars above
Spread your magic touch of love
Hearts aglow and minds in trance
In your light we start to dance

[Bridge]
In the night we're never bound
Heaven’s whispers all around
Close your eyes feel the light
Guiding us through the night
title: Stars Above
